project.name: Newegg SDK for Java - SBN
project.description: The SBN (Shipped by Newegg) Management service group is designed to help you send your inventory to one of Newegg’s warehouse. Once your inventory is in a Newegg’s warehouse, you will be able to sell your items on Newegg, or you can sell the products on different channels then use Shipped by Newegg to ship your orders.
